name: Stiftung Preußischer Kulturbesitz
goal: The SPK is the biggest cultural complex in Germany, consisting of libraries, archives and museums and two additional research institutions. SPK has been accredited as a full member of the German Research Council DFG.
interests: Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: PSI, Recommendations on Digital Cultural Heritage and Illicit traffic, long term preserevation, digitsation
